properties.name: supmap.properties.app-email
properties.description: The email address used by the application to send notifications and system messages to users.

properties.name: supmap.properties.database-name
properties.description: The name of the MongoDB database used by the authentication service to store user credentials and profiles.

properties.name: supmap.properties.default-profile-image
properties.description: The URL or path to the default profile image used when a user does not upload a custom avatar.

properties.name: supmap.properties.elasticsearch-password
properties.description: Password for authenticating with the Elasticsearch instance used for indexing and searching user data.

properties.name: supmap.properties.elasticsearch-url
properties.description: URL endpoint for the Elasticsearch service used for efficient querying of user profiles and authentication logs.

properties.name: supmap.properties.elasticsearch-username
properties.description: Username for authenticating with the Elasticsearch instance used for user data indexing.

properties.name: supmap.properties.jwt-secret
properties.description: Secret key used for signing JWT tokens to ensure their integrity and authenticity in the authentication process.

properties.name: supmap.properties.kafka-bootstrap-servers
properties.description: Comma-separated list of host:port pairs for establishing the initial connection to the Kafka cluster for authentication events.

properties.name: supmap.properties.mail-modified-username
properties.description: Template or subject line used in emails sent to users when their username has been modified.

properties.name: supmap.properties.mail-password
properties.description: Password for the email account used by the application to send authentication-related emails to users.

properties.name: supmap.properties.mongo-uri
properties.description: Connection string URI for the MongoDB database, including authentication credentials if required.

properties.name: supmap.properties.mail-register-confirmation-link
properties.description: URL template for the account confirmation link sent to users via email during the registration process.

properties.name: supmap.properties.reset-password-link
properties.description: URL template for the password reset link sent to users via email when they request to reset their password.
